406010.name: Sentou Gakuen: Isekai Kerfuffle
406010.description:
Life as a student was already tough. Exams, detention, and schoolyard brawls were more than enough to handle… until you found yourself whisked away to a fantasy world full of knights, dragons, and way too much medieval nonsense. Just your luck, right?

In this free expansion, your school day just got a lot weirder. Instead of history class, you’re dealing with enchanted ruins, scheming witches, and knights with questionable hygiene. Your new “curriculum”? Swinging swords, casting spells, and trying not to get eaten by a dragon. And here’s the kicker: you’re not stuck here forever (maybe), but figuring out how to return to your old life? That’s just another challenge on top of saving kingdoms and surviving deadly dungeons.

Will you master this new world and somehow find a way back, or will you be forever caught between tests and quests? Only one thing’s for sure—being a student at Sentou Gakuen was a lot simpler before you got dropped into a fantasy novel.
406010.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
